title: Another Massive FBI Scandal? (Ep 1647)
description:
Another massive scandal is brewing that involves the FBI, the NY Times, and a prominent conservative organization. 
In this episode I address the troubling details. 

News Picks:

Breaking: Federal judge demands FBI stop searching Project Veritas founder’s phone.


BLM leader threatens violence if his juvenile wishes aren’t granted.

Joe Biden is lying about his massive tax hikes, here’s the evidence. 

Tax collections are at a record high, and so is our debt.

“Investigative reporter” fails to investigate reporting.
